programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.(n)

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.(n)

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..(n)

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..(n)

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.(n)

programme.desc: Michael McKean has gadgets and gizmos a'plenty, and he's ready to show them all off! Discover that waffle irons were once incredible artists and the stand mixer almost went overboard, and find out why refrigerators could have been left out in the cold.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Cozy up with a bowl of chips because host Michael McKean has the scoop on our favorite dips. He'll discover that guacamole wouldn't be good without a mailman, queso almost started a civil war and chocolate fountains are full of physics.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Host Michael McKean has a date with Lady Luck and is ready to go all-in on some tempting Vegas eats. He'll find out how prime rib lured us all to Sin City, and why prohibition poured us all a shrimp cocktail.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Michael McKean gets caught in the middle of some culinary conflicts as he uncovers some very delicious details. He solves the Cuban Missile Crisis with chop suey, runs the redcoats out with cornbread and keeps the peace with a little kimchi.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Michael McKean gives thanks for our favorite Thanksgiving grub. He uncovers whether the turkey or the country came first, how burnt marshmallows ended up on sweet potatoes and if a lawyer gave up his career to put cranberries in a can.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Michael McKean turns our plates into a playground as he finds out the stories behind some famously fun foods! He'll spell out a solution to the Great Depression using alphabet soup and more.

programme.desc: Alton Brown simplifies the most common sauce quarries.

programme.title: Good Eats

programme.title: Good Eats: Reloaded
programme.desc: Alton Brown "reloads" an episode that has been bugging him for years. He finally comes to terms with grits and polenta while a certain Southern gentleman returns to teach the corniest bread of all.

programme.title: Good Eats: Reloaded
programme.desc: Alton Brown reloads his original pressure cooker episode with a brand-new broth and his take on the Vietnamese classic, pho.

programme.title: Man's Greatest Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking showcases 12 of the best grilled dishes in restaurants across America. He's hanging out in the kitchens of fire-loving chefs to learn everything there is to know about applying heat and smoke for the tastiest chicken, beef, and more.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger visits New England for two unique food traditions that celebrate family, friends and the community.

programme.title: Man Fire Food

programme.title: Man Fire Food

programme.title: Man Fire Food

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate

programme.desc: Never-before-seen footage and interviews as cameras follow Sting backstage before his big match at WCW Slamboree 1995.

programme.title: Adrian Street: Imagine What I Could Do To You
programme.desc: British star Adrian Street reflects on his life and career in sports entertainment. He looks back on his journey to become a controversial superstar and his experience coaching at the WWE Performance Center in the United Kingdom.

programme.title: The Comeback: Tegan Nox
programme.desc: Tegan Nox's WWE dream almost ended early due to a pair of serious knee injuries. Witness the highs and lows of her journey back to the ring.

programme.title: WWE Chronicle
programme.desc: After cutting her signature ponytail and beloved Bayley buddies, Bayley opens up about her evolution from The Huggable One to SmackDown Women's Champion. Trying to step out of the shadow of Sasha Banks, Bayley prepares to face her former best friend.

programme.title: WWE NXT
programme.desc: Sami Zayn's road to redemption and pursuit of the NXT Championship continues as he takes on a competitor he has never defeated, Tyler Breeze. Also, after weeks of attacks from The Ascension Hideo Itami has promised to bring a friend to help even the odds.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The Game Wardens are busy on land and water. In Hunt County, residents are concerned about alleged wolves being kept as pets. Rehabilitated turtles are released on the high seas. In West Texas, wild donkeys are under threat.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Anglers are out all over Texas. In Houston County, a Game Warden returns after a life-threatening injury. Along the coast, fishermen get caught with too many sharks. A protected turtle gets relocated and anglers on the Gulf learn how to tag fish.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's summertime in Texas. Game Wardens handle a speeding jet ski, drunk boaters, angry campers, and a rowdy raccoon.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Liberty County, the death of a deer is investigated. Fawns in Harris County are being illegally kept as pets. Patrol on Somerville Lake leads to multiple citations. A suspicious car is stopped in Red River County.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Marshall leads the charge on a poaching investigation. Warden Richards visits an allegedly illegal snake breeder. Wardens Gould and Hickerson try to save an injured pelican, while Warden Miller brings a caracara bird to rehab.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: With oyster season in full swing, Texas game wardens ensure everyone is following the rules on land and water. Hunters are investigated for trespassing on private property. The game wardens find an oyster boat deckhand with several warrants.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Uncuffed
programme.desc: Officer Bronson investigates a claim that an illegal deer kill was an accident. Officer Cyrs responds to a snowmobile accident, while Officer Holmes and McDermott join forces to run a decoy operation and a moose gets a wellness check from Sgt. Lucas.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Lieutenant Boudreau and trainee Crouse investigate a man who shot someone while hunting illegally. Sergeant Lucas responds to a porcupine wreaking havoc. Later, when a seriously ill hiker is trapped on Mount Garfield, Officer Holmes races to the scene.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Crouse responds to a call about a nuisance raccoon, while Officer Towne searches for a deer attacked by coyotes. Officer Hannett monitors a suspicious fisherman and Officer St. Pierre responds to a call about an impaired driver.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Uncuffed
programme.desc: When humans live so close to wildlife incidents are bound to happen. In this episode a baby deer is need of help from the conservations officers, and a homeowner calls up when a hawk stages a break-in at her home.(c)

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Up in the North Woods along the Canadian border, things are very different. A warden looking for smugglers encounters a drunk driver with a gun, and a suicidal man enters the woods with a shotgun.(c)

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A new class of wardens are being trained to do search and rescues. A hiker vanishes on the Appalachian trail and the wardens lead one of the largest search and rescue operations in Maine's history to find her.(c)

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A look back at the most exciting moments and never-before-seen stories.(c)

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As winter melts into spring, all kinds of wildlife are emerging, from baby raccoons to hungry black bears. A routine littering summons turns into a face off with a rabid pitbull. Some new evidence comes to light to revive an old deer poaching case.(c)

programme.title: Tanked!
programme.desc: Actor and producer Wilmer Valderrama asks the guys to build a tank with multiple angles and sides. Then, a health centre in Grand Rapids, Michigan wants a tank to mimic the city's famous rapids.(c)

programme.title: Tanked!

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The war for ice road supremacy is heating up and Polar Industries is pushing their drivers to the limit. Art Burke must cross one of the longest winter roads in the world. Polar's top driver, Todd Dewey, must dig himself out of mountains of fresh snow.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Polar Industries sends Todd on a risky run to deliver the heaviest haul in company history. Art is sent on a high-stakes rescue mission, and finds the job is more than he bargained for. Lisa lands an exclusive contract over one of Canada's wildest trails.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Polar boss Mark Kohaykewych shakes things up when he brings new soldier Mike Simmons into the winter roads battle. But when the rookie's paired with company wildcard Art Burke, it makes for a rocky trip.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: New business owners Darrell and Lisa get the jolt they need with a high-stakes mission: transformers desperately needed for a distant town's electrical supply. Polar's top dog Todd Dewey runs into trouble with a government contract.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Darrell and Lisa try to make good on a power play for their young company but could lose everything when Darrell's truck breaks down. Polar driver Todd must backtrack hundreds of miles to recover lost freight.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The battle gets down and dirty as the roads melt beneath the drivers' wheels. Art Burke fights to keep his rig above ground on a melting ice crossing, while fellow Polar driver Alex Debogorski fights his way up a mud-covered mountain.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: In the midst of the early thaw, Darrell and Lisa struggle to make it home over the hardest hit trail on the winter roads system. Art and the King of Obsolete reunite to haul a giant double trailer over a slick path.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The two rival companies join forces to take on the biggest challenge in 'Ice Road Truckers' history -- pulling a cat train across the frozen Hudson Bay. When the ice shatters under the weight of the haul, it becomes a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Lisa and Todd struggle to complete their daring joint venture across the frozen Hudson Bay. Darrell braves the most torn up trail remaining on the winter roads. Art must face the last open-ice crossing, his first since his near fatal trip weeks earlier.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: As experts predict one of the shortest and warmest winters on record, the ice road truckers face the biggest challenge in their history. The companies risk financial ruin and communities face devastation unless the drivers deliver the vital supplies.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Facing a season expected to be one of the shortest on record, both teams are under pressure. At Polar, Art Burke fights to get back on the road after his truck crashes into a snowbank.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Hundreds of miles from the nearest town, Lisa Kelly finds herself stranded. Darrell Ward rolls the dice by taking an off-road short cut, untested by any other truck.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Looking to expand their company, Darrell Ward and Lisa Kelly head into Alberta and onto a trail nicknamed 'The Death Road.' Art Burke faces off with the ice crossing where he nearly lost his life last season.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Twenty-two-year-old Steph Custance tries to complete the first ice roads mission of her career, but a crossing that's just opened pushes her to the edge. As temperatures soar, Alex runs into a road block. Art serves as a diplomat for Polar.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Darrell faces a trail nicknamed 'the obstacle course.' Todd struggles to clear a melting ice bridge. Alex is pushed to the limit hauling an oversized fuel tank.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: On her first ever solo trip, Polar rookie Steph Custance braves one of the longest ice crossings on the winter roads map. Darrell Ward attempts a triple delivery in a single day. An engine fire stops Lisa Kelly dead in her tracks.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: On March 18th, 2011, 32-year-old Patty Ayala is murdered at the Burger King where she works. Police find the safe open and a mysterious message next to Patty's body. They turn to surveillance video - and it's there the killer emerges from the shadows.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: When devoted mother Danielle Pruett goes missing in Tazewell, Virginia, police launch an investigation to find her. When her lifeless body is discovered in an open field, what starts as a web of lies and deceit becomes a race to track her killer.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: At an aquarium, thieves snatch a shark from an open tank and make a break for it, with employees hot on their heels. And then, two inmates make a clever escape by hiding in garbage cans. They're all on the run and the hunt is on to find them.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: A man is driving home when he sees a woman being dragged down the street against her will. Another man is visiting his girlfriend at work on Valentine's Day when a robber leaps onto the counter. Both men take heroic action, ensuring no harm is done.

programme.title: Chaos in Court
programme.desc: A former basketball star sentenced for abusing a girlfriend; an inmate shoots two deputies dead; a defendant throws chairs; a sex offender attacks a prosecutor; a man leapfrogs his way out of court; and a Rastafarian pot smoker lost in translation.

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.desc: A young mother vanishes while out jogging. A frantic search is mounted. Then, just as suddenly, three weeks later she reappears, battered and bruised and her long blond hair chopped off.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: Two armed thieves approach a young woman to steal her car. But they get a shock when she fights back. And then, the father of a 15-year-old girl sets up a family sting to apprehend the 33-year-old man who is trying to seduce her.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: An afternoon motorcycle ride turns into a violent road rage incident when a couple is attacked by an angry driver. And then, when a young woman working alone is robbed at knifepoint, she bravely fights back, fending off her assailant.

programme.title: Chaos in Court
programme.desc: A former basketball star sentenced for abusing a girlfriend; an inmate shoots two deputies dead; a defendant throws chairs; a sex offender attacks a prosecutor; a man leapfrogs his way out of court; and a Rastafarian pot smoker lost in translation.(c)

programme.title: 20/20 on ID
programme.desc: Aspen heiress Nancy Pfister had a taste for adventure, and a knack for making friends from all walks of life. But when her lifeless body was found in the closet of her home, many wondered if freewheeling Nancy had taken one chance too many.(c)

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: When devoted mother Danielle Pruett goes missing in Tazewell, Virginia, police launch an investigation to find her. When her lifeless body is discovered in an open field, what starts as a web of lies and deceit becomes a race to track her killer.(c)

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Small-town gal Frankie Cochran thinks she's found the one in handsome David Gehrard. But as his behavior brings rising cause for concern, Frankie wonders if a secret from his past might hold more meaning than she first thought.(c)

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: While out for a run in the Montana wilderness, 22-year-old college student Kari Swensen is taken prisoner by two mountain men. When she learns of their twisted plans for her, she'll do everything she can to escape or die trying.(c)

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: A young mother and her twelve-year-old son are brutally assaulted and strangled to death in a quiet New Brunswick town. It's a true whodunit and an intensely personal case for Detective Gerry Belliveau.(c)

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: When 17 year-old Jennifer Teague goes missing, her community is stunned. Detective Greg Brown turns to the town to help him find her killer.(c)

programme.title: The Case That Haunts Me
programme.desc: The investigation into the deaths of a Toronto couple leads a detective to uncover a pattern of escalating crimes that suggest a serial killer is operating in cottage country.(c)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A successful young attorney is gunned down in his own home. The shooter? His on-again, off-again girlfriend, a beautiful, young graduate student. She says it was self-defense. Police say it was something else.(c)

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Wrenches are turning in overdrive as the Kindig-It crew grinds on a '53 Ford Pickup, but a flesh wound threatens to make this build a bloody mess. A '69 Camaro muscles its way through the doors for a new suspension, and a '65 GTO rolls up.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Any and Tim take a professional drifting course, while Blair tackles a luxurious, yet smoking, 2013 Audi A8L. Dave installs a new rear end on Andy's '66 Nova, but a rusty exhaust could force him to resort to a few tricks.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy buys a stolen and stripped Porsche C4S at an auction, but Bobby is sure it'll sink him. Porsches are notorious money pits, and parts are pricey. Meanwhile, Dave Jensen works overtime to supercharge a '57 Belair for a drag race.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Between tracking down body parts for the stripped Porsche and helping a client modernize a vintage hot rod, Andy has gotten behind in his scrapping. Bob's not happy until Andy jumps in the forklift and starts smacking down cars.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: A badass '68 RS/SS Camaro hasn't run in more than 20 years, but now it's time to turn the former cover car into a 1,200 horsepower street car. Andy finds three of his childhood ATCs and asks the guys to make them raise hell again.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Emmett believes his 1964 Barracuda is all original. But Dan finds out that the car has hidden damage and a past that nobody expected. Velvet wants Dan to get her 1953 Studebaker Commander running as a surprise for her husband, Travis.

programme.title: Resto My Ride
programme.desc: An insurance company asks Dec and the team to build a custom 1968 Ford Mustang for a car show, but only gives them 10 weeks to do it. In the middle of the build, the team heads to SEMA in Las Vegas, Nevada, and comes back to more work than they expected.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: A Chevy Tri-Five that's been in the family for decades hasn't moved in 17 years. Two brothers join the Squad to try and get this 4-wheel family member back on the road.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A straight '63 Impala with a four speed and legendary 409 engine under the hood and the owner wants to keep it original with the main mods under the body, new frame, suspension and big wheels.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down what he believes is the finest-handling front wheel drive car ever made: the Lotus Elan M100. If Ant can get the engine and suspension back to glory, then Mike is convinced that some cosmetic upgrades will seal the deal.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Dodge SRT 10 truck has an 8.3 liter V10 Viper engine, and Mike finds one at a price he can't resist. Once Ant is sold on the plan, they dive in, working to make this vehicle powerful enough to dominate on a NASCAR track.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Golf GTi was a symbol of the 80s, and gave birth to the term 'hot hatch'. Mike finds a prime example of a Rabbit which he believes can be transformed. The market is crying out for cars like this, but Ant has a lot of work to do.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down a rare '91 Alfa Romeo 164L. He loves the look of this car but Ant has his work cut out for him. This Alpha has perfect bodywork, but it has a leaking engine, faulty steering, dodgy brakes, and a host of other issues.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a 2002 Chevrolet Corvette Z06 with over 400 hp and zero to sixty in under four seconds. It's a road-legal race car, but Ant is less than enthused when he realizes the scale of the work needed to help it regain those impressive numbers.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike gets his hands on the Japanese Ferrari, also known as a 1991 Toyota MR2 Turbo. One small fix becomes a big problem for Ant as the entire engine has to be removed but at least it gives him the chance to deal with even more problems along the way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a true Swedish Unicorn of the car world: a '95 Volvo 850 T-5R, a station wagon with a racing pedigree. Unfortunately, the Turbo in the T-5R is in need of TLC, and some creative thinking from the guys is needed to solve the bodywork issues.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: After an engine fire and the onset of some serious health issues, the owner of a 1966 Fairlane dreams of having this beauty rumble back to life.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A new customer comes into the shop with an exceptional 1963 Cadillac. This car screams luxury but needs an upgrade. With the owner giving the MBC team creative freedom on the build, Joe gets to work on a plan.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Manuel had been taken for a ride by mechanics who've somehow managed to convince Manuel to part with thousands of dollars with promises of restoring his Oldsmobile 442. Overhaulin' steps in and rescues the dreams of his perfected 442.

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: Tony is too embarrassed to drive his '66 Lemans because it's not reliable among other things. His best friends, Rob, and actor, Charlie Sheen, really put him through the ringer before he gets his car back from the Overhaulin' team.

programme.title: Overhaulin'

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate. But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back.

programme.title: The Flush
programme.desc: Travis Frank hunts Wyoming's iconic upland game bird.

programme.desc: Roger returns for his 13th year to hunt whitetail deer with Mark Hamilto at Huselby Creek Outfitters. He is joined by Fourth Arrow's CEO, Rob Wynalda.

programme.desc: Michael Waddell and T- Bone Turner are back at the Hooray Ranch in Kansas.

programme.title: Dirt Trax TV
programme.desc: Luke, AJ and Mark make use of Polaris' line up of vehicles as they go about their day in completely different ways.

programme.desc: Halfway through the season, each skipper faces a personal form of hell. Frozen crab, frozen gear and a frozen harbour chill the hearts of the most callous fishermen. On the Northwestern, Sig battles a fierce cigarette addiction and a fierce storm.

programme.title: Realtree Outdoors

programme.title: How the Universe Works

programme.title: How the Universe Works

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored

programme.desc: Does the Virgin Mary appear in a dust cloud as a landslide narrowly misses her church? How can a second sun suddenly appear over a city? And does a farmer's footage finally solve the riddle of mysterious crop circles.

programme.title: Weird Earth

programme.title: Weird Earth
programme.desc: What is the huge fizzing fireball filmed crashing through a farmer's field? Why does a forest seem to be breathing? And a mysterious horizontal cloud puzzles Japanese airplane passengers.

programme.title: Strangest Weather on Earth

programme.title: Strangest Weather on Earth

programme.title: Strangest Weather on Earth
programme.desc: Witness weird lighting, deadly rain bombs, freak dessert hailstorms, bizarre ropenadoes, seafloor volcanoes changing the weather, crystal clear lakes and a spiky forest of rain-carved rock.

programme.title: Hurricane 360
programme.desc: Superstorm Sandy, the largest Atlantic hurricane on record, made landfall on the New Jersey Coast on October 29th, 2012. Typically, storms that drift this far north lose steam and fade out to sea. Due to a freak system, Sandy morphed into a superstorm.

programme.title: Hurricane 360
programme.desc: A category 4 hurricane in the fall of 2008 caused the largest United States evacuation in history. The winds extended 120 miles from the eye of the storm creating tidal waves that completely devastated the residents of Crystal Beach, Texas.

programme.title: Hurricane 360
programme.desc: In the chaotic aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005, the worst natural disaster in the history of the United States, the city of New Orleans slips into anarchy as residents engage in a desperate struggle for survival.

programme.title: The World's Funniest Weather
programme.desc: A weather reporter catches a winter bug by inhaling a fly, a guy shoveling snow off a roof discovers the meaning of slippery slope, and a woman wakes up to a foot and a half of snow inside her car.

programme.title: The World's Funniest Weather
programme.desc: A leaky ceiling brings down the house, literally, a race car makes an unscheduled pit stop through a living room wall, and 'passing wind' takes on a whole new meaning during a weather report.
